projects.title: Portfolio
projects.details: Developed using Angular, showcasing a portfolio to highlight skills, projects, and contact details.

projects.title: Weahter App
projects.details: Created with Angular, it fetches real-time weather data from an API. It includes functionalities for selecting specific days and displays weather forecasts.

projects.title: Eshop market
projects.details: An e-commerce platform built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and APIs. It includes interactive features for product browsing and filtering.

projects.title: Furniture | team project
projects.details: A collaborative project using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, showcasing an online furniture store with modern design.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.details: A functional calculator built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, featuring basic arithmetic operations.

projects.title: To do List
projects.details: A task management application built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, allowing users to add, mark, or delete tasks.

projects.title: counter
projects.details: A simple counter application created using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, enabling users to increment or decrement a count value.

projects.title: ministry of communication
projects.details: A website designed for a government ministry using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Swiper.js, showcasing responsive design and image sliders.

projects.title: shapely
projects.details: A creative landing page developed with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, focusing on an aesthetic design.

projects.title: charity | team project
projects.details: A collaborative website for a charity organization built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, emphasizing clean design and responsiveness.

projects.title: Gricklo
projects.details: A simple project focusing on layout design using HTML and CSS, emphasizing visual appeal and minimalistic design.

services.skill: Build responsive and dynamic web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and Angular.
Work with modern frameworks like Angular to create dynamic and interactive user interfaces.
Optimize web applications for performance and accessibility.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality code.
Implement responsive design and ensure cross-browser compatibility.
Contribute to open-source projects and actively participate in developer communities.
Provide ongoing support and maintenance for existing projects.
